lead_paragraph: Three online gambling companies won a ruling against the French Tennis Federation when a Belgian court rejected the organization’s move to block them from taking bets on the French Open. The court ruled that Bwin, Betfair and Ladbrokes do not “encourage corruption” by taking bets on tennis.
